import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Outlet,useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import Footer from '../Footer/Footer' import { SideBar } from '../Sidebar/SideBar' const Body = () => { const location = useLocation(); return ( <>

{(location.pathname=='/')?'Dashboard':location.pathname.replaceAll('_',' ').slice(1)}

Home {(location.pathname=='/')?'/ Dashboard':location.pathname.replace("/", " / ")}

) } export default Body
